name: Block Hit Fever
description:
Experiencing the best destruction physics on mobile devices.

Block Hit Fever is an easy hyper casual game. Easy to play, stress releasing, and no network required.

Shoot the balls at the rotating blocks. Aim at the middle for a PERFECT score. Try not to hit the red blocks or the CORE. Else you will lose.

Collect the Yellow Coins to Revive yourself when you lose. Each level you can revive once. Use it wisely!

The difficulty increase as per leveling up. Keep challenge yourself and be the top of the leaderboard!

FEATURES
- Over 100+ levels
- Simple hit and break game

HOW TO PLAY
- Each stage has one tower made by layers of walls.
- Shoot the balls into the walls to break them, and proceed to the next layer.
- Destroy all the layers to move to the next stage.
- Each 5th stage is the boss stage- beat them to proceed further!
- Pay attention to red walls and the core of the tower. Do not hit them.
- Launch the ball at the rift of the wall to fill the fever gauge. The more rift you hit the faster you fill the gauge.

This experience requires focus, concentration, and timing. Can you beat this Block Hit Fever shooting challenge?
